video_description: MobileBurn.com - The T-Mobile G-Slate is the U.S. version of LG's Optimus Pad, an Android 3.0 Honeycomb tablet with an 8.9-inch display and dual 5 megapixel cameras for recording 3D video. It even comes with a pair of old school 3D glasses, though it's best to use the HDMI output capability. The G-Slate also offers 32GB of internal storage, stereo speakers, and a forward facing 2 megapixel camera. Full review: http://www.mobileburn.com/review.jsp?Id=14201
title: T-Mobile G-Slate (LG Optimus Pad) video review - part 2 of 2
